attributes.action: Outdoor Tennis clubs be permitted to reopen during the lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Tennis clubs are vital for mental health during lockdowns and safe distancing is natural as the net acts as a barrier.
attributes.background: Permit tennis clubs to reopen for tennis to be played outside

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow indoor/outdoor tennis courts to operate under strict distancing protocols: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557428

Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557658
